title: Help me, what is this font?
content:
Hi,

I need help with this font too.  
Does anyone know what font this is?

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [20130315\_151433.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414230458/http:/typophile.com/files/20130315_151433_0.jpg) | 397.28 KB |
author: julia kim

comments.content: Looks like Helvetica Bold that has been stencilfied. (I totally made up that word.) Maybe custom... There are about a million versions of Helvetica, but I don't know of a stencil-type typeface you can actually find /buy currently. Does that help at all?

I believe it's AG Book Stencil: [http://www.bertholdtypes.com/font/ag-book-stencil-et-al/pro/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414230458/http:/www.bertholdtypes.com/font/ag-book-stencil-et-al/pro/ "http://www.bertholdtypes.com/font/ag-book-stencil-et-al/pro/")
It is AG Book Stencil (Regular) / [Adobe] - confirmed by Find My Font
